moduleMetadataJson.name: Windows Active Directory Wordlist Builder
moduleMetadataJson.description:
This module will gather information from the default Active Domain (AD) directory
        and use these words to seed a wordlist. By default it enumerates user accounts to
        build the wordlist.
author: Thomas Ring

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.

options.name: DOMAIN
options.description: The domain to query or distinguished name (e.g. DC=test,DC=com)

options.name: MAX_SEARCH
options.description: Maximum values to retrieve, 0 for all.

options.name: FIELDS
options.description: Fields to retrieve (ie, sn, givenName, displayName, description, comment)
